amendment.description: To allow a refundable tax credit for the energy costs of farmers and ranchers, and to modify the foreign tax credit rules applicable to dual capacity taxpayers.

action.text: Amendment SA 2629 proposed by Senator Dayton.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 2629 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 51. Record Vote Number: 345.
Amendment SA 2629 ruled out of order by the chair.
